env.name: WG_HOST
env.label: Public IP/Domain Name
env.description: The public IP/hostname of your VPN server.

env.name: PASSWORD
env.label: WebUI password
env.description: When set, requires a password when logging in to the Web UI.

env.name: WG_PORT
env.label: Port
env.description: The public UDP port of your VPN server. WireGuard will always listen on 51820 inside the Docker container.

env.name: WG_MTU
env.label: MTU
env.description: The MTU the clients will use. Server uses default WG MTU.

env.name: WG_PERSISTENT_KEEPALIVE
env.label: Connection Keepalive (seconds)
env.description: Value in seconds to keep the connection open. If this value is 0, then connections won't be kept alive.

env.name: WG_PRE_UP
env.label: Pre-Up
env.description: Optionally run a command before the interface is brought up.

env.name: WG_POST_UP
env.label: Post-Up
env.description: Optionally run a command after the interface is brought up.

env.name: WG_PRE_DOWN
env.label: Pre-Down
env.description: Optionally run a command before the interface is brought down.

env.name: WG_POST_DOWN
env.label: Post-Down
env.description: Optionally run a command after the interface is brought down.
